name: Ah-Voidance
description:
Invulnerability Now Added in Update Version 0.1.0
  • Invulnerability
    • When taking damage, the player becomes invulnerable for a short period of time. After the invulnerability wears off the player will be able to take damage again.
Overview
  • A simple endless arcade runner game where the player must move up and down lanes to avoid obstacles.
How to Play
  • Move the player up and down lanes to avoid obstacles for as long as you can.
  • Avoid obstacles to gain points. Only in the two & four lane modes.
  • Every certain amount of points the speed of the obstacles will increase.
  • If the player runs into an obstacle they will lose a heart.
  • If the player runs into a coin they will add a point to the score. Only in collect mode.
  • Once all hearts are gone its game over.
Game Modes
  • Two Lane mode.
    • Perfect for beginners.
    • Every 50 points the speed of the obstacles will increase.
  • Four Lane mode.
    • More of a challenge.
    • Every 100 points the speed of the obstacles will increase.
  • Collect mode.
    • Fun extra game mode with four lanes and added coins.
    • Collect coins to increase the score.
    • Every 100 points the speed of the obstacles will increase.
Controls
  • Up arrow key to move the character up a line.
  • Down arrow key to move the character down a line.
Additional Info
  • All assets and tutorials followed will be included in the games credit window. Trying to give credit where credit is due!
  • This game is currently in active development. Everything is subject to change.
